thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Bank (Tower) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good Place to Stay
thread.title_full: Good Place to Stay - Review of Premier Inn London Bank (Tower) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: PJTRAVELS1501
title: Good Place to Stay
text:
Stayed here for a long London weekend - all was good. Booked an access room which was all that was left to be honest but had plenty of space. Great nights sleeps in the bed! Coffee & tea making facility but if you are fussy, bring your own. Combined shower gel / hair wash supplied but the same rule applies. Hairdryer in room, which really has such a weak blow, it could take you a while to have fancy London hair!
Located less than 5 minuets walk from Monument station, right past a couple of pubs - see my other reviews - which was handy. Easy walk to Tower & London Bridge.
All staff we dealt with were great, really friendly and helpful - allowed us to leave our cases at the hotel until later in the day.
We had breakfast & dinner both were good for us. Bar service was fine.
We asked to use an iron and board when required, all good.
All in all a great stay and would use again.
If you want room with a view don't stay here - we were about 20ft away from people working in offices but this didn't bother us.... we were on holiday!
Well recommended.
